title: Is there any way to get a small amount of RP?
body:
I am about 30 RP short off 975 RP, I would like to get a skin but I am short :(

Is there any way I could receive a small amount of RP :) 
Thanks.

replies.body:
Hey there,

I hear that the good folks over on the Player Support team provide small amounts of RP in exchange for some fanart (Good or Bad) perhaps you should try [submitting a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) along with some of your own art to them.
